message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV 

This paper deals with natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning techniques to predict tags for movies from plot synopses. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also deals with information retrieval (IR) and recommendation systems, which makes cs.IR (Information Retrieval) another likely category. The use of neural networks and machine learning techniques also makes cs.LG (Machine Learning) a possible category. Additionally, the paper deals with emotion analysis, which is a subfield of artificial intelligence (AI), making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another possible category. Finally, the paper also mentions visual experiences, which could be related to computer vision (cs.CV).
